nodes.text: I'm a fuckin' provider, waddya think? I'm like a good Samurai-itan guy.
Pai-san-o, you know, the kids. My kids.
They bring me stuff what they find. Little, little things. Stuff no one ain't usin' no more. In return, I takes care of 'em.
I provide fer them little paisanos.
That 'bout do it for ya, pal?
Yeah, well they work for me. They bring me things. Little things. You know.
What you talkin' about? You think I'm a fucking stupid pirla? Some dumb filio di puttana? You think I'm some kinda clown? Am I here to amuse you, is that it?
Hey der, I'm Flick. What the fuck do you want, huh?
Momma runs a food place over in da East side a town. Just past the graveyard. Nice place, she got good pasta, Mama mia.
That's right. Metzger, that stronzo, he's dead. I don't know what happen to Vic.
Vault huh? Maybe Momma knows about that, 'cause I don't. But that Vic guy - him I know. Metzger's got that porca pistola.

links.text: Say what?
Uh, oh. OK. Goodbye, Flick.
Yeah, uh, well…let me ask you something else.
They must have brought you some real bargains. Let's see what you've got.
Just checking. Well, goodbye Flick.
Let me ask you about something else then.
Your kids?
Well, I'm not really interested in music lessons for children. Let me ask you about something else.
Sounds like a nice arrangement.
You provide little pianos?
That did it. See you around Flick.
Actually, I'd like to ask you a question.
Actually I'd like to take another look at your goods if I may.
Ah, I see. Well, I don't want to cramp your, uh, style. Goodbye.
Oh, OK. Let me ask you something else then.
Uh, no.
Yeah, that's right, shithead. And nothing's going to amuse me more than your death-throes.
Well, if you're going to get all huffy about it, I'm leaving.
Uh, no. Sorry, I was just curious. Let me ask you about something else.
What the hell do you do here?
I'd like to trade with you.
I'm looking for a Vault - oh yeah, and some trader named Vic, too. Know where they might be?
What's with the wacky accent, Flick?
Thanks, What about that Metzger fellow that's got Vic?
Thanks, that's all I need to know. Goodbye.
Thanks. Let me ask you something else.
Thanks, now what about Momma?
Thanks, that's all I need to know. Goodbye.
Thanks. Let me ask you something else.
Thanks, that's all I need to know. Goodbye.
Who's Metzger?
Thanks. Let me ask you something else.
Who's Momma?
